name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Heyou for Linkedin | Auto-Like on Linkedin

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly automate LinkedIn engagements while building your personal brand and your company's online presence.

long.ar,de,es,fil,fr,hi,it,ja,ko,nl,ru,vi,zh_:
Effortlessly automate LinkedIn engagements. Experience a hands-free approach to strengthening connections and building your personal brand and your company’s online presence.

😴💤 Support your company while Zzz… Promote your brand on social media by doing what you do best - focusing on your work, while the extension works in the background, skyrocketing your company’s social performance.

👍 Get marketing off your back & just like their posts: No need to manually like posts anymore. Let the extension do it for you. 

🌟 Boost your own brand image: Engage online without doing a thing to keep your account active. 

Q&A 
Which posts will the extension like on my behalf?
The extension only works on your company’s corporate Linkedin page posts.

Can I turn it off for other pages? 
Only if you’re added as a user to another page by a page admin. 

Will I be able to turn this off?
Of course, you can ask your admin to take you off.

What happens if I leave the company? 
When your email is disconnected from your Linkedin account, your account will no longer be active.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Use Heyou Linkedin Companion to auto-like personal profiles and companies posts to boost your social reach.

Engage with brands, prospects, customers, candidates and partners - entirely automatically with Heyou’s authentic auto-engagement. Teams use Heyou to boost their engagement levels dramatically and finally seize the true social media impact.

What’s in it for you?
🌟 Engage with prospects, customers, candidates, partners and more: Engage automatically with connections you wish to keep close, and foster important relationships.

😴💤 Support your company brand and HR efforts while you Zzz… Promote your brand on social media by doing what you do best - focusing on your work, while the extension works in the background, skyrocketing your company’s social performance.

👍 Get everyone off your back & just like company posts automatically: No need to get scolded for not liking the company’s posts, let the extension do it for you.

Heyou’s Features: 
✅ Auto-like company posts: Heyou auto-likes posts of the company you’re associated to, or other companies you’re invited to.  
✅ Auto-like personal profiles posts: Heyou auto-likes posts of connections of your choice (go to the connection you wish to auto like and toggle the “foster relationships” on!) 
✅ Monthly engagement report: Heyou provides a monthly report so you can see the impact of your engagement on the posts you liked.
✅ Hands-off experience: Seamless and hands-off experience for your team using Heyou's extension, as it works flawlessly behind the scenes. 

Q&A 
How does it work?
Every time you go on Linkedin, Heyou’s technology auto-likes on your behalf automatically. It’s important to know that Heyou imitates real human behavior, which makes the engagement real and impactful for each post. 

Which posts will the extension like on my behalf?
The extension works on your company’s corporate Linkedin page posts, other companies you’re invited to like, and personal profiles of your choice.

Will I be able to turn this off?
Of course, you can ask your admin to take you off, or remove the extension.

What happens if I leave the company?
When your email is disconnected from your Linkedin account, your account will no longer be active.
